reviewText: Too bad this was the final season.  Could have enjoyed many more years, but all good programs come to a completion.  Glad to have it to finish out my collection.

reviewText: The set matches the previous sets. The only complaint I have is not against the product itself but rather the TV executives of the time.  What would be the final episode is a pathetic end to a fantastic series.

Title: Matlock: The Ninth and Final Season

reviewText: Over the last few years I'm been acquiring the Matlock series either by pre-order or shortly after they came out. It's a great classic courtroom drama series (Perry Mason seasons are also - and the final season of that comes out soon). Both of these courtroom drama series are from times when TV had shows with "G" ratings and relied on good acting and good plots rather than most of the violent, sexual and political agendas of today's shows most of which are rated TV-14 or higher - not exactly wholesome viewing
summary: Finally able to complete the set
Title: Matlock: The Ninth and Final Season

reviewText: Some long-running series peter out at the end, so my husband and I hesitated to watch this one, but we couldn't resist. I am so glad we did. It was fun right up to the ending credit of the last episode. We loved the characters and the stories, so it was hard to let them go, but every last one was a delight. If you like Murder She Wrote and Diagnosis Murder, you will love this series.
summary: Hate to see it end, but fun through the very last episode!
Title: Matlock: The Ninth and Final Season

reviewText: Andy Griffith was great as Matlock and he really made me laugh.  It was a great run for the show and really enjoyed watching it.
Title: Matlock: The Ninth and Final Season

reviewText: This is great!  I am a big fan of Andy Griffith and anything he plays in.  I would highly recommend this series!
Title: Matlock: The Ninth and Final Season

reviewText: In my own Opinion, I would have to say that this Finial Season of Matlock, it's ok, BUT, it Isn't Nearly as Good as the First { 1st } Eight { 8 } Seasons, in my own Opinion.  Also, I myself Don't care for the way the Network had Ended the Series, in my own Opinion, I think that they could have done a Better Job in the way they had Ended the Series, but that's Strictly my own Opinion, and I can ONLY Speak for Myself, I Can't Speak for Anyone Else, I can ONLY Speak for myself.
summary: What is that, I Never Heard of Heard of it, what is it?
Title: Matlock: The Ninth and Final Season

reviewText: I am an avid Matlock watcher and this final season completed my collection. It is as amazing then as it is now. Long Live Matlock!!
